name: Alex Stamper
text: This location must have changed management! It was semi cleaner, although they should redo the flooring or something! But the people working there now seemed much happier and made my food nicely and were so polite! Last time I was there a few months ago it was horrible! But now it seems much better. Nice.

name: Kimberly S
text: Ordered two pizzas, one was fine..one was falling apart and burnt to the box. Took 20 to 30 mins to get original but will take 70 mins to get the remake unless i want to pick it up when i clearly paid for delivery. Yeah I'm not picking up a pizza when i paid to have it delivered.

name: Troy
text: Excellent and quick service. Thank you!!!

name: Chelsea Boone
text: Ordered a pizza for delivery at 6:09pm, and at 8:22pm when I still hadn’t gotten it I called for an update. Was told “there is only 1 driver, she has all the pizzas and is out right now.” No apology for the wait, no additional effort to …More

name: Tony Gwyn
text: Great food as always! Unfortunately, a school was having their lunch at the same time I was there... however the Pizza Hut servers performed admirably, keeping my drink full and assisting the other patrons.  You really can't beat the price either.

name: mario andres
text: I have ordered through the app in the past and had decent experiences one delivery guy dropped the water bottles frozen like rocks. Though the pizza was alright. I like the taste of pizza hut so I'm biased. Apparently people don't seem to have a good opinion about this specific Pizza hut store.

name: Alex Jarrell
text: This place should shut down. Horrible customer service, not enough staff and the inside is downright disgusting. Go anywhere else and if you want delivery in a timely manner, order from anywhere else.

name: Charlie Suzie
text: Not face friendly, rude, pizza excellent

name: Tara Hines
text: My order was ready and food was smelling good.

name: D'Anthoni Johnson
text: They will completely neglect your order if they don't feel like delivering it! even if u pay and tip in advance! DO NOT ORDER PIZZA FROM THIS LOCATION!

name: Carl Lheureux
text: Outstanding service and food. The Shrimp and grits are exquisite. The bread was amazing. Definitely worthy of the trip from up north.

name: Keith Huffstetler
text: Close to home and great pizzas!

name: Alex Miller
text: This location needs to be shut down. It’s disgusting and filthy inside always. I ordered my pizzas waited 15-20 minutes to come pick them up. Waited forever to be helped. And they hadn’t even started my pizza. No apologies.

name: Bobbie Jo Richey
text: Terrible experience. Waited 30 minutes for a large pizza. Came out wrong. Then went to pay and had no change for me to pay cash. We were the only ones in the restaurant. The girl was very unorganized and unprofessional.

name: Frank Hassell
text:
Pizza was just OK. Even for takeout the service was lackluster.  I was using a coupon that gave three toppings.  Wanted extra cheese.  Only pizza place I know that doesn't consider that an additional
topping.

name: Nia Bridges
text: I ordered 7 pizzas online at 4 PM. When I showed up 15 minus before my pick up time... I was told one my order had been bumped and two... that there was no way my order would be ready by my scheduled due time.... I asked why... and got a story about how pizza hut only  sends them orders ten minutes before they are due.

name: Kevin Smith
text: Buffett has great salad bar, variety of pizzas.

name: Chase Johnson
text: "We're out of wings, and it's gonna be an hour for your pizza." -8:10pm on a Tuesday. I was called after placing an order online. Someone just didn't feel like doing anything I'm afraid. Super awesome experience, will order here again.

name: Gary Thornton
text: Got the 2 for $5.99 each deal. Order was taken cheerfully and accurately. Food was made quickly and correctly. Taste was good when I arrived home. The pizza held it's temperature well. 5 stars for a job well done!!

name: Stefan Moore
text: I love pizza hut

name: Josh Uhl
text: The temperature in the restaurant was very cold in the dining in part of the restaurant and we saw trash everywhere,stuff on tables the staff did not care one bit did not know much of anything they were nice but I only give it a 2 * and …More

name: Yas Shenek
text: Buffet wasnt fresh and manager wouldn't put requested pizza on buffet because buffet time was almost over.

name: Nicole Holloway
text: The ad is false about all you can eat 4 99. The restaurant was filthy food xold

name: Debra Serber
text: My husband and I ate here tonight , We got here @ 6:10 p.m. The food was ok, we ordered thin n crispy pizza @ cheese sticks. It took 20 minutes to get them, then another our pizza.  My husband had to ask them where he cheese sticks were, …More

name: Herbert Richardson Jr.
text: The people were very friendly and informative! I placed my order and only waited five minutes for my pizza to be ready. They checked my order twice and we're great conversationalists. This was a great experience.

name: Beda Gonzalez
text: Worst service ever! My kids and I got there at around 7pm and ordered our food. One hour later...we were still sitting there sipping our water and waiting on our pizza. Our "waitress" couldn't even bother to come check on us and let us know …More

name: Humberto Cantu
text: The service and food was great!

name: Zachary Farley
text: Delivery time was nearly an hour and a half and my order was incorrect.

name: Philp Myers
text: The food wasnt good...not very good service....

name: Ashleigh Hunter
text: I ordered online from them twice and both times I didn’t not receive my order I called and asked if they were delivering they told me yes and when I called to check the ETA of my order they said they didn’t have it. I’m done with Pizza Hut in general to many mistakes from this location. Also this happened within the past 4 months.

name: Nakesha Rousseau
text: They didnt have any personal pan pizzas,  they weren't serving wings because the machine was down and the salad bar was sketchy. It didnt look fresh, the space where the vinegar & oil was suppose to be(which was empty) was sticky, dressings looked old.

name: thomas olson
text: Dark empty, pizza ok

name: Brian So
text: Always good service.

name: Jim Gerrety
text: Fresh hot pizza buffet

name: Obi Diya
text: Great pizza, BUT was highly offended that my husband and I were told that we could only sit on one side of the restaurant because they didn't want to have to re clean the side that where we wanted to sit!!!!Vacuum cleaner was being pushed …More

name: Laura Love
text: Ate there today, and my fiance got food poisoning from the salad bar!!!! Our server was a total mess... will never ever go back.....

name: Tania Martinez
text: They always have my Pizza and wings on point

name: Lex Vegas
text: Service was atrocious, the staff members were very rude and inconsiderate of my children's orders. When requesting to talk to the manager, I was put on hold and waited for 10 minutes only to have my name and number written down and I'm still waiting on that call back. NEVER will my family waste money at this store AGAIN!

name: Charles Ingram
text: Manager was rude and unhelpful..

name: chelsi blandford
text: I had a delivery order yesterday & the driver was so rude ! I opened the door & he did not say not 1 word to me, not even a hello..he didn’t read over my order ..it was dead silence so I didn’t leave him a tip & when he saw that I didn’t …More

name: Alex Bhutia
text: Pizza gave me a stomach ache and the temperature is way to cold.

name: Meghan Ward
text: I will never order from this Pizza Hut ever again. I ordered my food for my party and only 3 pizzas and I called 30 mins after the delivery was suppose to be here and got told oh he's on his way and when I called ten mins prior I got told he just left. Here it is now 40 mins later and still no food. NEVER AGAIN!!!!!

name: Jerry McFadyen
text: Food was fast, hot and good. The restaurant itself is in very poor condition. Falling apart, foul smelling and dirty tables. No wonder we were the only customers.

name: Alex18867
text: I've ordered from this location several times and I've always had good food and fast service. The manager was really helpful in resolving a store credit problem that was issued at another Pizza Hut location. Great customer service!

name: Trina Shepherd
text: Manager and staff very nice very professional environment very clean food is great service is fast I recommend anyone to eat here!!!!

name: Karissa Fleming
text: Wings SUCK and a few of our 8 wings were just tiny crust pieces

name: Nykki Hosch
text: Very good!!!  Just need to wear gloves & hairnets

name: Michael Lai
text: $8 lunch pizza buffet! This was my jam! Kinda musky inside and decor is similar to a dive bar. Classic Pizzahut roof and private parking lot outside.

name: Allison Johnson
text: We ordered a pizza with two sides. Waited over an hour. They come with the wrong pizza and missing sides. I tried to call but the person on the other end was very unprofessional and yelling to someone else while still on the phone with me. Than they hung up before I was finished veryifying our order

name: williegwillie@gmail.com dodge2010
text: Great customer service and a great place for a quick lunch

name: Lacy Johnson
text: Minimal pizza came out for the buffet. Still worth the money. Friendly staff.

name: Jordan Burleson
text: The staff is the reason for the low review. Pizza is better than it was a few years ago and very fresh taste and quality.

name: Kipp Hollingsworth
text: It's a pizza hut. And kind of a rundown one. Food is standard Pizza Hut. Service is a mixed bag. People are friendly, but it's a always chaotic.

name: Lori Abundis-Ortiz
text: Only went there cause of my grandson

name: Della Shoemaker
text: Tried to order food to the fair grounds and they refused to take my order because I DO NOT KNOW the address for the fair grounds. What kind of delivery restaurant does this and does not know the address to the fair ??????

name: Gururaj R
text: Very friendly staff, nice and cosy place to sit and eat.. good options for Veggie pizza as well..

name: Trey Cox
text: One of the few pizza huts to still have a real dine in option.

name: Michael Bickford
text: My family and I have never had a real great experience at this Pizza Hut. Until a week or so ago, we went on the weekend during the evening. The place was surprisingly busy for what we had encountered there before. The Manager Jarian and a …More
